sections.title: Purpose
sections.content: The purpose of this document is to outline the proposed downtown redevelopment ordinance and establish a timeline for the City Council's vote on its approval by the end of November.

sections.title: Scope
sections.content: This ordinance pertains to the redevelopment of designated downtown areas within the city limits, including but not limited to zoning changes, infrastructure improvements, and aesthetic enhancements aimed at revitalizing the downtown economy.

sections.title: Terms
sections.content: 1. The City Council shall convene to discuss and deliberate on the proposed ordinance. 2. A vote on the ordinance is to be scheduled no later than November 30 of the current year. 3. All necessary public hearings and consultations with stakeholders will be conducted prior to the vote.

issues: Need for budget allocation for redevelopment
